data.title: Medical Consultation Website Modernization
data.description: Revamping a medical consultation website using Angular.
data.details: I worked on restructuring and modernizing the medical consultation website at Galáxia Digital, migrating from pure JavaScript to Angular. The transformation included interface, usability, and performance improvements, resulting in a more modern and functional design.

data.title: Mattress Company Website Development
data.description: Website development for a mattress company using Angular.
data.details: I was responsible for creating and optimizing a mattress company's website, replacing pure JavaScript with Angular. The project resulted in a more sophisticated design, improved user experience, faster navigation, and a modern look.

data.title: Queue Reduction and Sales Increase
data.details: I worked on optimizing the payment flow at Grupo Panvel, enabling transactions to be processed directly at the counter. This change significantly reduced queues and positively impacted sales.

data.title: Bug Fixing and Quality Assurance
data.description: Identifying and fixing issues before release.
data.details: I conducted continuous testing and problem anticipation at Grupo Panvel, ensuring the delivery of a more stable and secure code while minimizing production failures.

data.title: User Experience Improvement
data.details: At Grupo Panvel, I optimized interfaces to make new system flows more intuitive and efficient. I enhanced the payment process and adapted the interface to facilitate user adoption, ensuring a smoother and more accessible experience.

data.title: Code Review and Code Quality
data.description: Code review to ensure reliability and performance.
data.details: During my time at Grupo Panvel, I actively participated in code reviews, identifying critical issues and suggesting improvements. These practices helped maintain a cleaner, standardized, and better-performing codebase, ensuring more secure and efficient deliveries.

data.title: Internal Platform Development for Startups
data.description: Creation of an internal system for startup management.
data.details: I was responsible for developing an internal platform for startups at Grupo Panvel, eliminating the dependency on third-party software. This project provided more autonomy and control over processes, allowing for more efficient and customized management.

data.title: AI Exploration for Document Processing
data.description: Automated conversion of PDFs into structured strings.
data.details: At Grupo Panvel, I explored the use of Artificial Intelligence to automate document processing. I developed a system capable of extracting and structuring data from PDFs, optimizing internal processes and reducing the need for manual intervention.

data.title: Front-end Development for Panvel Website
data.description: Worked on the site's interface using Angular and NgRx.
data.details: I contributed to the development of the Panvel website using Angular, NgRx, and RxJS, ensuring a dynamic and responsive interface. Additionally, I implemented automated tests with Cypress and Jasmine, ensuring the quality and stability of delivered features.

data.title: Store Management and Multifunctional Support
data.details: At Clica Combustível, I was responsible for managing the convenience store, ensuring organization and smooth operation. Additionally, I provided multifunctional support, assisting as a cashier and fuel attendant when needed.

data.title: IT Management and Technical Support
data.details: At Clica Combustível, I was responsible for maintaining the IT infrastructure, diagnosing and repairing computers. I also managed the network and internal systems, ensuring continuous and efficient store operations.

data.title: Camera and CCTV Monitoring
data.details: I managed the security camera system at Clica Combustível, ensuring operational integrity and actively contributing to incident prevention.
